name: Turritopsis (HexMozart88)
description: This is a quick little game I made for the IGMC 2022. It follows Oliver, a trans man attempting to socially transition. The theme of this jam was rebirth, so I decided to make it a metaphorical rebirth in that he's transitioning to become what he should be. You have two stats to keep track of: your mental health and your reputation. If either one of these gets low, it affects the other option. If both of them get to 0, you get a bad ending. You determine these stats by making choices throughout the game, and the bars will vary depending on your choice.
